definitions.definition: A person who deviates , especially from norms of social behavior .
examples: He was branded as a deviant and ostracized.

definitions.definition: A thing , phenomenon , or trend that deviates from an expectation or pattern .
examples: As the graph shows, the March sales trend is the deviant .

definitions.definition: A member of the online art community DeviantArt .

main_definition: A person who deviates , especially from norms of social behavior .
secondary_definitions: A thing , phenomenon , or trend that deviates from an expectation or pattern .
( Internet ) A member of the online art community DeviantArt .
